title: Fashion Fabric Samples
description: See Description Below Plain weave. Black, grey and white warp. Bands of blue and rust weft.  Both selvedges.  Machine stitched both ends.  Stapled to 8.5 x 11\" card along with 99.1.1129.90. \"Fashion Fabrics E74\" written on card. (black,grey, white.blue, rust)
